nodes.title: Add convenient methods for DeepLinkReceived event (close #474)
Add lifecycle context to indicate app state when the event is tracked (close #471)
Capture campaign attribution data from deep links (close #470)
Fix Gdpr context being tracked without enabling it (close #457)
Remove protocol from NetworkController and NetworkConnection (close #432)
Store sessions info separately per tracker namespace (close #430)
Add API reference documentation for configurations and controllers (close #428)
Allow multiple instances of the tracker (close #426)
Renew event ID when event object is reused (close #390)
Move from Travis CI to GitHub Actions (close #375)
IAB enrichment treats Android tracker events as spider-generated (close #359)
Make POST path of Emitter configurable (close #319)
Cannot unset user id from subject (close #353)
Fix screen context not correctly updated on screenView events (close #350)
Session userId renewed for the same user (close #345)
Fix crash when lifecycleEvents is enabled on Tracker initialisation
Ensuring the EventStore database cursor is closed
Do not send idfa if tracking is limited
Added ability to customize Futures timeout for emits.
Ability to share an OkHttpClient instance with Emitter.
Fix logger crashing when a value contains '%'
Add network type and technology to mobile context
[WIP] Split out Common module and add Lite tracker
[WIP] Minimizing footprint by removing Rx and RetroLamba
Do not call AsyncTask.get() in UI thread
Update to latest gradle tools and plugin
Add GET and POST logging in the Emitter
